svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 7 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 7, 2024" date: "2024-12-07"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
â€¢ Execution layer focused protocol call (ACDE #201): Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : 97%
participation, client teams fixing issues Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch devnet before the
holidays EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed, agree async EIP7623 increase
calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing call which devnet to add to
EIP7762 increase min blob base fee : not included for now, discuss at RollCall (L2 standards) &
consensus layer call (ACDC) next week EIP4803 limit transaction gas : proposed to retroactively
include History expiry plan : pre-merge expiry set for May 1, discussed if new eth/70 protocol needed
(EIP7639) All Core Devs process improvements : added Declined for Inclusion EIP status and
non-consensus changing EIPs can be included in upgrade Meta EIPs
â€¢ Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : 97% participation, client teams fixing issues Pectra-devnet-5 spec
: ideally launch devnet before the holidays EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed,
agree async EIP7623 increase calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing call
which devnet to add to EIP7762 increase min blob base fee : not included for now, discuss at RollCall
(L2 standards) & consensus layer call (ACDC) next week
Pectra upgrade:
â€¢ Mekong testnet : 97% participation, client teams fixing issues
Mekong testnet : 97% participation, client teams fixing issues
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch devnet before the holidays
Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch devnet before the holidays
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed, agree async
EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed, agree async
â€¢ EIP7623 increase calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing call which
devnet to add to
EIP7623 increase calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing call which
â€¢ EIP7762 increase min blob base fee : not included for now, discuss at RollCall (L2 standards) &
consensus layer call (ACDC) next week
â€¢ EIP4803 limit transaction gas : proposed to retroactively include
EIP4803 limit transaction gas : proposed to retroactively include
â€¢ History expiry plan : pre-merge expiry set for May 1, discussed if new eth/70 protocol needed
History expiry plan : pre-merge expiry set for May 1, discussed if new eth/70 protocol needed
â€¢ All Core Devs process improvements : added Declined for Inclusion EIP status and non-consensus
changing EIPs can be included in upgrade Meta EIPs
All Core Devs process improvements : added Declined for Inclusion EIP status and non-consensus
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Client testing call #15 : Mekong testnet deposit processing fixed and Pectra-devnet-5 spec
discussions
Client testing call #15 : Mekong testnet deposit processing fixed and Pectra-devnet-5 spec discussions
â€¢ Pectra system contracts for consolidations, withdrawals & block hash lookup; used instead of
precompiles, implemented in Assembly
Pectra system contracts for consolidations, withdrawals & block hash lookup; used instead of
Amsterdam upgrade
â€¢ Stateless implementers call #28 (formerly Verkle): file based approach for preimage distribution and
implementation in progress of EIP7736 leaf-level state expiry
Layer 1
â€¢ Bandwidth availability shows reasonable to increase blob count
Bandwidth availability shows reasonable to increase blob count
â€¢ EVMMAX implementers call #1 : Poseidon planned as first use case
EVMMAX implementers call #1 : Poseidon planned as first use case
For stakers
â€¢ Slashing event : 21 validators slashed for attestation violation
Slashing event : 21 validators slashed for attestation violation
â€¢ SOLO : proposal for liquid staking using portion of stake unlikely to be lost, without needing
governance, trusted hardware or permissioned operator sets
SOLO : proposal for liquid staking using portion of stake unlikely to be lost, without needing
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate
based on 74% self reported data) Consensus layer: Prysm 35% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v6.0.0 : hierarchical state diffs (on-disk tree states) for more compact
archive nodes, downgrading requires resync Nimbus v24.11.0 : faster forward sync, experimental light
client-based sync (testing only) and fixes config mismatch errors for unscheduled upgrades
â€¢ Lighthouse v6.0.0 : hierarchical state diffs (on-disk tree states) for more compact archive nodes,
downgrading requires resync
Lighthouse v6.0.0 : hierarchical state diffs (on-disk tree states) for more compact archive nodes,
â€¢ Nimbus v24.11.0 : faster forward sync, experimental light client-based sync (testing only) and fixes
config mismatch errors for unscheduled upgrades
Nimbus v24.11.0 : faster forward sync, experimental light client-based sync (testing only) and fixes
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum Connect : interface for users to force include transactions during sequencer downtime
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7830 : Contract size limit increase for EOF EIP7833 :
Scheduled function calls EIP7834 : Separate metadata section for EOF
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7830 : Contract size limit increase for EOF
EIP7830 : Contract size limit increase for EOF
â€¢ EIP7833 : Scheduled function calls
EIP7833 : Scheduled function calls
â€¢ EIP7834 : Separate metadata section for EOF
EIP7834 : Separate metadata section for EOF
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7831 : Multi-chain addressing ERC7832 : Sustainable NFT collections
ERC7835 : wallet_transmitCrossChainIntents method ERC7836 : Wallet call preparation API
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7831 : Multi-chain addressing
ERC7831 : Multi-chain addressing
â€¢ ERC7832 : Sustainable NFT collections
ERC7832 : Sustainable NFT collections
â€¢ ERC7835 : wallet_transmitCrossChainIntents method
ERC7835 : wallet_transmitCrossChainIntents method
â€¢ ERC7836 : Wallet call preparation API
ERC7836 : Wallet call preparation API
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry: forge build 10-36% faster compilation, forge coverage 2x faster
Foundry: forge build 10-36% faster compilation, forge coverage 2x faster
â€¢ Hardhat v2.22.17 : adds Solidity v0.8.28 support
Hardhat v2.22.17 : adds Solidity v0.8.28 support
â€¢ Ape v0.8.21 (Python contract framework): faster console launch & auto fork chains
Ape v0.8.21 (Python contract framework): faster console launch & auto fork chains
â€¢ Frangio: Solidity learnings & working on EVML (EVM language)
Frangio: Solidity learnings & working on EVML (EVM language)
â€¢ Tornado Cash reference manual : architecture, Circom circuit, Solidity contracts and client side
proof generation & verification
Tornado Cash reference manual : architecture, Circom circuit, Solidity contracts and client side proof
generation & verification
â€¢ eth_simulateV1 explainer : standardized approach for multicall via JSON-RPC
eth_simulateV1 explainer : standardized approach for multicall via JSON-RPC
â€¢ Rotki balance scanner (Vyper): query ETH/token balances, deployed on mainnet & L2s
Rotki balance scanner (Vyper): query ETH/token balances, deployed on mainnet & L2s
â€¢ Drift (create cached contract calls): adds hooks
Drift (create cached contract calls): adds hooks
â€¢ Safe owner manager : manage Safe multisig owners & thresholds in bulk
Safe owner manager : manage Safe multisig owners & thresholds in bulk
Security
â€¢ Vestra $500k exploit on mainnet
Vestra $500k exploit on mainnet
â€¢ Clipper (DEX) $460k exploit on Optimism & Base
Clipper (DEX) $460k exploit on Optimism & Base
â€¢ Spectral Syntax v2 $200k exploit on Base via infinite approval
Spectral Syntax v2 $200k exploit on Base via infinite approval
â€¢ ETH Rangers , $25k stipend from EF for public goods security work, December 20 deadline
ETH Rangers , $25k stipend from EF for public goods security work, December 20 deadline
Job Listings
â€¢ Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
â€¢ Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
â€¢ Nethermind: AI Agent , Infra , Blockchain , Full Stack , BizDev & Researcher
Nethermind: AI Agent , Infra , Blockchain , Full Stack , BizDev & Researcher
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 4.5 to 202.4 gwei, 20.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1
gwei 2.7k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 4.5 to 202.4 gwei, 20.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1 gwei
Gas: 4.5 to 202.4 gwei, 20.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1 gwei
â€¢ 2.7k ETH net issuance this week
2.7k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $3,543 - $4,089, currently $4,022, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,543 - $4,089, currently $4,022, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.04 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.04 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Ecosystem
â€¢ EF Q3 grantees share $12.8 million in funding
EF Q3 grantees share $12.8 million in funding
â€¢ Public goods dashboards share $250k via quadratic voting at Devcon
Public goods dashboards share $250k via quadratic voting at Devcon
Enterprise
â€¢ Wyoming stable token commission: request for qualifications to support state issued USD backed
stablecoin, deadline December 12
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Vitalikâ€™s ideal wallet : cross-L2, secure from users & wallet devs, private transfers, store private
data, secure chain access & keystores
Vitalikâ€™s ideal wallet : cross-L2, secure from users & wallet devs, private transfers, store private
â€¢ ENS DAO grants : $12-50k for public goods projects
ENS DAO grants : $12-50k for public goods projects
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Paul Atkins to be nominated as SEC Chair; David Sacks to be White House AI & crypto czar
Paul Atkins to be nominated as SEC Chair; David Sacks to be White House AI & crypto czar
â€¢ Coinbase obtained FDICâ€™s requests for banks to pause crypto activities
Coinbase obtained FDICâ€™s requests for banks to pause crypto activities
â€¢ Alex Mashinsky (former Celsius CEO) pleaded guilty to fraud
Alex Mashinsky (former Celsius CEO) pleaded guilty to fraud
General
â€¢ XT exchange $1M stolen
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
